Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Because AI should be used, because AI is developing too fast, people who can't use AI will be left behind in society, even if AI is sometimes unreliable, but some of the answers it provides may inspire us to find the best solution
